storyText:
It's afternoon Friday and after some morning classes and an afternoon nap youâ€™ve eaten some dinner and you're getting ready for the night. You look over at your partner as you survey outfits laid out in your yurt - "I can't decide!" you exclaim, "Do we match? Are we going onesies or sexy?". They laugh and join you in your survey - "hmm...I like the matching idea. It's supposed to be pretty warm tonight so maybe sexy?"

What do you decide to wear?
name: root

choices.selectionText: Onesies are my kind of sexy! You pick up the kangaroo onesie and hand over the duck.
choices.name: Onesie
choices.storyText:
Dressed and ready to go you hop on your bikes and head out as the city begins to twinkle with lights and pulse with sound. You can feel the palpable energy in the air and can't wait to join in.

Where do you go first?

choices.selectionText: Find the highest piece of art you can see - you want a view!
choices.name: Climb
choices.storyText:
As you climb the lights twinkly out into the distance and you feel a bit like one little star in a vast solar system of light and color. You find a place to sit with your feet dangling below you and your arms wrapped around each other. You take a minute to take it all in.

What do you do next?

choices.selectionText: Sit up here and watch for a while
choices.name: Sit
choices.storyText:
You stay for a while letting yourself get lost in the random patterns of movement below you. Eventually you decide to climb down and join in.

Where do you go?

choices.selectionText: Deeper into playa
choices.name: Deeper
choices.storyText:
Awash in a sea of lights you're not sure what's city and what's open playa anymore. Color and sound pulse around you and you feel all at once grounded and swept away. Your partner puts their arms around you and you lean back.

Where do you go?

choices.selectionText: The brightest light you can see
choices.name: Light
choices.storyText:
Time blurs as you dive into your experience. You can see dawn beginning to creep in at the edges of the sky and the tide of late night revelers begin to gradually head towards a morning sleep. You're not ready for this night to end and you're determined to see the sunrise.

Where do you go to watch it?

choices.selectionText: You head towards the trash fence
choices.name: Fence
choices.storyText: You park your bikes and settle into the dust as the warm glow of dawn further lights the sky. Others have migrated to the trash fence as well and laughter and stories of the night create a hum around you as you greet the new day.

choices.selectionText: You make your way to the temple
choices.name: Temple
choices.storyText: The temple welcomes you with a quiet understanding and acceptance. As the sun begins to warm your faces you sit in contented silence as you let the calming energy guide your reflections on all that you have experienced.

choices.selectionText: The loudest music you can see
choices.name: Music

choices.selectionText: Head down to check out that thing on fire you saw earlier
choices.name: Sit
choices.storyText:
It's a burning gas station! You remember exploring this piece earlier in the week and marvel at it as pieces of it fall burning to the ground.

choices.selectionText: Deeper into playa
